attributes.action: Create a bank holiday or celebration day to honour all NHS staff.
attributes.additional_details:
Because we as a country need to remember and honour those and currently working tirelessly around the clock caring for our people.

There should be concerts and festivals which in return generate income for the NHS and boost morale for the working force of the NHS. 

Especially after this Covid 19 pandemic it would be a crime not to celebrate our key workers for all they have done.
attributes.background: To create a day or bank holiday honouring the NHS staff who have helped this country 365 days a year since the creation of the NHS.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303882

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
